Key Match Events: David Brooks scored the opening goal for Wales in the 3rd minute
Neco Williams doubled Wales' lead in the 38th minute
Teemu Pukki scored Finland's only goal in the 45th minute
Brennan Johnson extended Wales' lead to 3-1 in the 47th minute
Dan James scored the fourth goal for Wales in the 87th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Rob Page emphasized the importance of bringing their A-game to secure success
Finland coach Markku Kanerva acknowledged Wales as a good side with talented individuals and a strong defensive unit
Post-Match Reflections: Rob Page expressed his team's readiness for the challenge and their preparation for the play-off final against Poland
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in a packed Cardiff City Stadium
Others: Wales have a population of over 3 million, while Finland has a population of nearly 40 million
